overview: Sam, an anxious soon-to-be-father, prepares for a Memorial Day party as he cares for his vegetative dad, William. When his nephew, Paul, expresses interest in William's war medals, Sam suspects Paul will do anything to acquire the medals, even kill him.

production_companies.name: Florida State University College of Motion Picture Arts

tagline: Land of the free, home of the neurotic.
title: War Crimes
